helper.word

Class BorderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.word.BorderManager

  • public class BorderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles word border data as it is applied to table-cells (and presumably paragraphs as well)
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka

    • Constructor Detail

      • BorderManager

        public BorderManager(CSSManager cssmanager,
                     org.apache.poi.hwpf.usermodel.BorderCode[] bordercodes,
                     int[] paddingSupplement)
        Parameters:
        cssmanager - The manager where the output gets written
        bordercodes - A 4-element array with the border properties in the order required by CSS (i.e. top, right, bottom, left)
        paddingSupplement - A 4-element array with padding data in the order required by CSS (i.e. top, right, bottom, left)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - One of the arguments is null or invalid

    • Method Detail

      • writeBorderProperties

        public void writeBorderProperties()
        Compute the border- and padding properties and write them to cssmanager

        private static float getBorderWidth(int input)
        Reads out the correct border width according to MS DOC spec, 2014, 2.9.17f
        Parameters:
        the - lineWidth as it is stored in dptLineWidth
        Returns:
        The border width in points

      • getStyle

        private static java.lang.String getStyle(int input)
        Converts a brcType into a CSS border descriptor
        based on [MS-DOC], v20080215, p.99
        Parameters:
        input - A numeric representation of a brcType
        Returns:
        A string representing a css border type, never null
